Name: Voxabular P.I: Penny's First Case
About the game: Play as Penny, a private investigator, as she takes on her first missing person's case. Rummage through your friend's belongings. Break into a house looking for clues. Fast talk your way out of getting arrested. Type in a command, and your character will do it. Say anything to a character, and they will respond. Use the hints or translate anything with one click whenever you're tired.
